definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to play tricks/to play at politics

sentences.english: They find Jamey on the ground, bleeding from her left wrist.
sentences.chinese: 在房间里，他们发现杰米倒在地上，左手腕大量出血。

sentences.english: Loosen 1st to open a hand, my wrist was quickly made by you to break.
sentences.chinese: 先松开手，我手腕快被你弄断了。

sentences.english: While she spoke she turned a silver bracelet round and round her wrist.
sentences.chinese: 她说话时不停地玩弄着手腕上的银镯。

sentences.english: He clutches my wrists, trying to pry my hands away.
sentences.chinese: 他捉住我的手腕，想要把我的手掰走。

sentences.english: The wrist strip can also be used separately.
THE uncle had a great fall and is now in hospital nursing a fractured wrist.
sentences.chinese: 大叔摔倒了，现在在医院里，左手腕打着石膏。

sentences.english: Learn how to escape a single wrist grab in this free video on kid's self-defense.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何摆脱在这个免费视频单手腕孩子的自卫抢。

sentences.english: Anna lunges at Jack and locks her wrists behind his back in her famous bear hug.
sentences.chinese: 安娜运用她著名的熊抱把用手腕锁住了杰克的后背。

sentences.english: A gold bracelet dangled from his left wrist.
sentences.chinese: 一只金手镯在他的左手腕上晃来晃去。

sentences.english: Kevin grabbed for his wrist, knocking a sushi roll across the living room.
sentences.chinese: 凯文抓住了他的手腕，一卷寿丝被打的飞出了大厅。

sentences.english: My next question was about his famous cupped left wrist.
sentences.chinese: 我的下一个问题就是关于他那著名的左手腕内曲。

sentences.english: The twenty-two twins twisted wrists twice on the Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 二十二个孪生子在圣诞前夜拧了两次手腕。

sentences.english: My heart thumps fast. My wrist is hurting. Wes is killing me.
sentences.chinese: 我心跳加快，手腕很疼，维斯简直是在要我的命啊。

sentences.english: And here lies the explanation for much of the Kremlin's recent behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 克里姆林最近的强硬手腕，原因大多可解释如下。

sentences.english: Moore looked at the wrists, encircled by bruises.
sentences.chinese: 莫拓森望向受害者的手腕，有一圈瘀伤。

sentences.english: She grasped his wrist and pressed a bundle of folded money into his palm.
sentences.chinese: 她抓住他的手腕，把一大把卷起来的钱塞到他手里。
